content: ['abi.encode', 'bytes', 'abi.decode', 'bytes', '// SPDX-License-Identifier: MITpragma solidity ^0.8.17;contract AbiDecode {    struct MyStruct {        string name;        uint[2] nums;    }    function encode(        uint x,        address addr,        uint[] calldata arr,        MyStruct calldata myStruct    ) external pure returns (bytes memory) {        return abi.encode(x, addr, arr, myStruct);    }    function decode(        bytes calldata data    )        external        pure        returns (uint x, address addr, uint[] memory arr, MyStruct memory myStruct)    {        // (uint x, address addr, uint[] memory arr, MyStruct myStruct) = ...        (x, addr, arr, myStruct) = abi.decode(data, (uint, address, uint[], MyStruct));    }}']
